GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by id number

GET /api/users.description: responds with an array of objects with username property

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments on given article
